--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> wrote:
> >So said Kabarnacius Anandaraj on 2003-07-24 --------------------

> >How to write a test case file is created or not and
> >message is updated or not 
> >Please help me is possible write a test case for this
> >methods.
> 
> java.io.File provides methods to verify whether a file exists. Use 
> them.
> 
> java.io.File provides methods for reading the contents of a file. Use 
> them.

Then you know the file io stuff works as advertised :)

I'd mock the file and verify that my code interacts with it as
desired.  I believe the MockObjects framework includes mocks for File.

Dave
